t: Joshua 12
List of Defeated Kings

These*p are the kings of the land whom the Israelites had defeated and whose territory they took over east of the Jordan, from the Arnon Gorge to Mount Hermon, including all the eastern side of the Arabah:

Sihon*p king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon. He*ln ruled from Aroer on the rim of the Arnon Gorge—from the middle of the gorge—to the Jabbok River, which is the border of the Ammonites. This included half of Gilead.
He also ruled over the eastern Arabah from the Sea of Galilee to the Sea of the Arabah (that is, the Dead Sea), to Beth Jeshimoth, and then southward below the slopes of Pisgah.
And*p the territory of Og king of Bashan, one of the last of the Rephaites, who reigned in Ashtaroth and Edrei.
He*ln ruled over Mount Hermon, Salekah, all of Bashan to the border of the people of Geshur and Maakah, and half of Gilead to the border of Sihon king of Heshbon.

Moses,*p the servant of the Lord,*s and the Israelites conquered them. And Moses the servant of the Lord*s gave their land to the Reubenites, the Gadites and the half-tribe of Manasseh to be their possession.

Here*p is a list of the kings of the land that Joshua and the Israelites conquered on the west side of the Jordan, from Baal Gad in the Valley of Lebanon to Mount Halak, which rises toward Seir. Joshua gave their lands as an inheritance to the tribes of Israel according to their tribal divisions.

The lands included the hill country, the western foothills, the Arabah, the mountain slopes, the wilderness and the Negev. These were the lands of the Hittites, Amorites, Canaanites, Perizzites, Hivites and Jebusites. These were the kings:
the*ple king of Jericho one*lg the*le king of Ai (near Bethel) one*lg
the*le king of Jerusalem one*lg the*le king of Hebron one*lg
the*le king of Jarmuth one*lg the*le king of Lachish one*lg
the*le king of Eglon one*lg the*le king of Gezer one*lg
the*le king of Debir one*lg the*le king of Geder one*lg
the*le king of Hormah one*lg the*le king of Arad one*lg
the*le king of Libnah one*lg the*le king of Adullam one*lg
the*le king of Makkedah one*lg the*le king of Bethel one*lg
the*le king of Tappuah one*lg the*le king of Hepher one*lg
the*le king of Aphek one*lg the*le king of Lasharon one*lg
the*le king of Madon one*lg the*le king of Hazor one*lg
the*le king of Shimron Meron one*lg the*le king of Akshaph one*lg
the*le king of Taanach one*lg the*le king of Megiddo one*lg
the*le king of Kedesh one*lg the*le king of Jokneam in Carmel one*lg
the*le king of Dor (in Naphoth Dor) one*lg the*le king of Goyim in Gilgal one*lg
the*le king of Tirzah one*lg thirty-one*lg kings in all.
